¿Sabías que el color verde es tóxico y no ecológico?

04 Nov 2019, 15:21


La sociedad tiene una idea que la ecologia es verde y pensar en verde, asimismo promocionan, realizan distintas propaganda por diversos medios donde el dicho color es el protagonista del material publicitario.




Asimismo, el color verde es usado como emblema de la ecología. De hecho son muchos los productos y articulos que presumen ser ecológicos utilizan el color verde para resaltar su amabilidad con el medio ambiente.



Sin embargo un informe que hace el químico alemán Michael Braungart a The New York Times explica que teñir el plástico de verde o imprimir tinta verde sobre papel es inevitablemente contaminante.
text:
Did you know that the color green is toxic and not ecological?

04 Nov 2019, 15:21


The society has an idea that the ecology is green and think green, they also promote, carry out different propaganda by various means where the said color is the protagonist of the advertising material.




Also, the green color is used as an emblem of ecology. In fact there are many products and articles that claim to be ecological use the color green to highlight their friendliness with the environment.



However, a report by German chemist Michael Braungart to The New York Times explains that dyeing green plastic or printing green ink on paper is inevitably polluting.
